posts.title: Working my last nightshift
posts.body: Today is my almost last night shift... almost there. I just have to wait until morning ad then one more and i am done. for good i hope. see ya suckers!

posts.title: Composition API
posts.body: I am learning about router in composition API, and i think i am getting quite good at it.
